Text:
shattered to see no comments on how good the show is let alone any comment at all.
this show is underrated.
at first the characters didn't really work that well together but this show is getting good.
and thanks VTV of course.
Thank you! "VTV" keep eem coming more please :)
Where are the seeds?  I have been trying to download since last night and at 3.2%.
EXCELLENT show!  Probably my favorite out of all networks... Thanks VTV!
I agree. I wasn't into this show at first. The writers tweaked the characters and some excellent special guests began to appear. It's good!

Anyone want to upload a Torrent of All the episodes in one file ? I don't want to clog and clutter my screen with 11 files that could easily be done in one. I'd do it, but I'm not good at hiding myself

@hiddensight: you'll see full season downloads once the season finishes up

@VTV: great job as usual, guys!

I agree with joo i enjoy the originality of Alphas as well as the characters.  It has been getting better and better in quality.  Gary is definitely my favorite.
Thank you VTV for the up load.
S2 was signed for Alphas as well as S3 of Warehouse 13. The 2 best shows on syfy

@kismo3, 12 is part of 11. 
To all others with this thought about Gary, I'd like to meet him, imagine playing a guy with autism and act like that so in character, I think he's an awesome actor!!! I see a great career ahead!!
Damn, what an ending =). I hope there's a continuation on Alphas, they can't stop now... O.o
